description: Kunisaki Rena is a player who wins a special chibi version of Blackrose`s avatar in a contest developed by Aura. She originally plays as a female BladeMaster named Brigit and becomes bored of The World until she learns of the exploits of Kite and his companions. She starts playing The World along with her twin brother, Shugo, who won a version of Kite`s avatar, and uses her new character to support him in becoming a hero. The two work to reunite Aura with her daughter, Zefie.
name: Kunisaki Rena
